thread.title: Better Homes and Gardens Rand Realty Names Frank DiCocco as New Closter Manager
thread.title_full: Better Homes and Gardens Rand Realty Names Frank DiCocco as New Closter Manager

author: Jamie Troia
title: Better Homes and Gardens Rand Realty Names Frank DiCocco as New Closter Manager
text:
Better Homes and Gardens Rand Realty is pleased to announce Frank DiCocco as the new manager of their office in Closter, New Jersey. “I’m very honored to be the manager of Rand Realty’s Closter office,” said DiCocco. “After working in real estate for almost a decade, this industry has become a true passion of mine, and I look forward to sharing that passion with my associates through this exciting position.”
DiCocco has extensive experience as a real estate trainer and coach, and is known by many as an esteemed former teacher at Bergen Catholic High School in Oradell, and also as a leader of song at the Church of the Presentation in Upper Saddle River.
As a broker associate, DiCocco has served clients in rentals and residential sales throughout Bergen, Essex, and Passaic Counties. Having lived in these areas his whole life, DiCocco is familiar with these locations and the towns surrounding them, and he excelled in servicing his New Jersey clients.
“Frank is an amazing trainer and brings tremendous knowledge and energy to our Management Team,” said Matthew Rand, managing partner of Rand Realty. “His understanding of the area has made him a wonderful choice for Closter’s managerial position, and I look forward to seeing the success that he can bring to the company.”
About Better Homes and Gardens Rand Realty
Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate - Rand Realty, founded in 1984, is the No. 1 real estate brokerage firm in the Greater Hudson Valley, with over 25 offices serving Westchester, Rockland, Orange, Putnam, and Dutchess Counties in New York, as well as Bergen and Passaic Counties in New Jersey.
Rand Realty has more than 800 residential real estate sales associates, as well as a commercial real estate company (Rand Commercial Services) and the Hudson United Group, which provide residential mortgage lending, title services, and commercial and residential insurance.
The companies can be found online at http://www.randrealty.com , http://www.randcommercial.com , and http://www.hudsonunited.com . Rand Realty can also be found and interacted with on Facebook and Twitter .
